description.value: Your familiar is dark of fur or feather, and light seems to disappear into it. When you Cast or Sustain a hex, and your familiar is adjacent to an enemy to which it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden], or undetected, the enemy becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.
